Class Universe

java.lang.Object
  Universe

public class Universe
extends Object

Class Universe - a universe which contains comets, stars, planets and black holes.

Version:
2016.03.13
Author:
Robert Topp & UP781587

          Return the list of space objects currently in the universe

          Return the y cordinate of the top of the universe

Constructor Detail

Universe

public Universe()
Create a universe with default name and size. Creates a fresh canvas to display the universe

Universe

public Universe(String name,
                int rightEdge,
                int bottomEdge)
Create a universe with given name and size

Parameters:
name - The name to give the universe
rightEdge - The maximum x coordinate
bottomEdge - The maximum y coordinate

run

Goes through the spaceList array drawing / moving each object and checking its life. Goes through the delList array deleting all the objects in the list.
